page.title: 03COLNE ENGAINE
page.content: { Colne Engaine}is quite a small village,with about 600 people.There is a primary school,a church,a petrol station,a village hall and a mobile fish and chip shop. Most of the houses look quite modern.There is a old school house that looks very pretty.There are several allotments.The school is very small with only three class rooms,a football pitch and netball ground,although the school is quite new. The village is about one and a half miles from{Earls Colne.}People living in {Colne Engaine}travel to work as the only work in {Colne {Engaine }is a small builders yard. Most people travel to{Colchester, {Halstead}and{Braintree.}
